findings.title: Whitelist Integration:
findings.description: Incorporate a mapping or array structure in the contract to hold whitelisted fee tokens and platforms, and validate token addresses against the whitelist before accepting as fees.

findings.title: L01. Floating Pragma
findings.description: The contract utilizes a floating pragma notation ^0.8.18 which can pose risks since it might lead to the contract's deployment with a compiler version different from the one it was rigorously tested with.
findings.contract: Multiple contracts (IBrokers, BrokersStorage, BrokersSignatureUtils, BrokersTokenTransferrer, Brokers)

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The contract allows minting an unlimited number of garbageFeeToken, which can lead to unintended consequences.
